pageTitle: TriviaBot : Mini Games, ROFL : World of Warcraft AddOns
textBeforeTable: Optional Files (3) # feature: support for party leader. # feature: more intelligent in accepting valid answers. # bugfix: questions answering themselves for the game host when the question text contains the answer. # bugfix: reverting to the custom channel despite the last channel is valid. # bugfix: taking over '1' for custom channel. # bugfix: channel initialization over a "cold login". # WoW 4.0.x API compatibility updates (script handlers, this->self etc too many to list individually) ========== v2.6.1-40000 # feature: support for the optional QuestionMaker addon for quiz authors. # feature: proper localization support. # bugfix: dropdown menus refreshing ========== v2.7.0-40000 is now much better equipped to support it. Focus will hopefully shift to content = quiz updates as the addon addon breaking bug is found. This will probably be the last major release for a while unless an TriviaBot_QuestionMaker can still be used to help in the process. and basic instructions on how to create your own quiz plugin. # Feature: TriviaBot\Questions now contains a sample Quiz addon Users have the option to pick the quiz themes and languages they.
